item.title: Online Resources
item.description: Schmachtenberger Videos and Articles # Daniel Schmachtenberger is a social philosopher who helped coin the term “meta-crisis”.

item.title: Reading List
item.description: The Denial of Death by Ernest Becker # Synopsis: Ernest Becker’s The Denial of Death (1973) is a seminal work that explores the concept of death denial and its profound impact on human behavior and culture.
